readable.title: 883040210_3c4a10f030
readable.content: A climber is sillhouetted against the sky and rocks as he hangs by a rope from another rock . A person hangs from a safety rope as he climbs down a large cliff . A person is abseiling down a rock face attached to a rope . A person jumping down a rope on a cliff . The man repels down the side of a cliff .
